description:
DISCLAIMER: This course is a sample course to teach you about Ultra Memory. This is a "lite" version of our Ultra Memory Masterclass (/ultramemory). 

A great memory and quick recall will improve many aspects of your daily life. This starter course is for everyone; business professional, students, professional speakers, parents, children and more. This course will teach you about visually linking items together to help remember large amounts of information. Chain linking can be used with any type of list or procedure based information.
title: Chain Linking: Your First Step to a Better Memory
